title: The Best Candid Backstage Moments at the 2017 Oscars
text:
Ashton Sanders and Jharrel Jerome share a moment backstage. 2 Of 29 
Alessandra Ambrosio admires Rosie Huntington-Whiteley 's baby bump at an after party. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
